subject: Re: [junit] Tool generated code - Is it possible to test  all methods functionality?
msgSnippet: Hi, ... See the FAQ: http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm#tests_11 ... What is the problem with testing methods that take objects? Robert -- Lassen Sie
messageBody:
Hi,

> But the code generated by our tool contains lot of private
> methods.
See the FAQ: http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm#tests_11

> Plz keep the above mentioned and give me any suggestions how can
> we test the methods that are taking objects as parameters using Junit ?
What is the problem with testing methods that take objects?

Robert

--
Lassen Sie Ihren Gedanken freien Lauf... z.B. per FreeSMS
GMX bietet bis zu 100 FreeSMS/Monat: http://www.gmx.net/de/go/mail
